question: Who are the key decision-makers in organizations that have partnered with multiple IT vendors over the last year?

subtasks.task: Identify organizations that have partnered with multiple IT vendors in the last year. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
Extract key decision-makers from the leadership excerpts of those organizations. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Match the decision-makers to the organizations identified in step 1. [CompanyITPartnerDetail, CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
